import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("../input/new-years-resolutions-in-2021-and-2022/nyr_data.csv")
source.adf110b5:
plt.title("Respondents by state")

states = df.groupby("State").size()

plt.pie(states, labels=states.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
source.50d6e4b6:
plt.title("Respondents by generation")

generations = df.groupby("Generation").size()

plt.pie(generations, labels=generations.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
source.742f5991:
plt.title("Respondents by gender")

genders = df.groupby("Gender").size()

plt.pie(genders, labels=genders.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
source.6f6e0f7c:
plt.title("Had a 2021 resolution")

had_2021 = df.groupby("Had 2021").size()

plt.pie(had_2021, labels=had_2021.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
source.fdcef90d:
plt.title("2021 resolution categories")

cats_2021 = df.groupby("2021 category").size()

plt.bar(cats_2021.index, cats_2021)
source.108ad06b:
plt.title("2021 resolution accomplishment")

acc_2021 = df.groupby("Accomplished 2021").size()

plt.bar(acc_2021.index, acc_2021)
source.2b26258a:
plt.title("Have a 2022 resolution")

have_2022 = df.groupby("Have 2022").size()

plt.pie(have_2022, labels=have_2022.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
source.492430de:
plt.title("2022 resolution categories")

cats_2022 = df.groupby("2022 category").size()

plt.bar(cats_2022.index, cats_2022)
source.4f894a7f:
plt.title("2022 accomplishment expectations")

exp_2022 = df.groupby("Expecting to accomplish 2022").size()

plt.bar(exp_2022.index, exp_2022)
source.4cffd0a1:
plt.title("2022 failure expectations")

exp_fail_2022 = df.groupby("Expecting to fail 2022").size()

plt.pie(exp_fail_2022, labels=exp_fail_2022.index, autopct="%1.f%%")
